code: import React from"react";import Icofont from"react-icofont";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var postsPerPage=_ref.postsPerPage,totalPosts=_ref.totalPosts,page=_ref.page,currentPage=_ref.currentPage;var pages=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalPosts/postsPerPage);i++){pages.push(i);}var positionTop=function positionTop(){window.scrollTo(0,380);};var prevPage=function prevPage(e){page(e,currentPage-1);positionTop();};var nextPage=function nextPage(e){page(e,currentPage+1);positionTop();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clearfix",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"!#",className:currentPage===1?"isDisabled":null,onClick:function onClick(e){return prevPage(e);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icofont,{icon:"simple-left"})})}),pages.map(function(number){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"!#",onClick:function onClick(e){page(e,number);positionTop();},className:number===currentPage?"active":null,children:number})},number);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"!#",className:currentPage===pages.length?"isDisabled":null,onClick:function onClick(e){return nextPage(e);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icofont,{icon:"simple-right"})})})]})});};export default Pagination;
